verses.text: And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, These \add are\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, that \add ye\add* should \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w work|strong="H4399"\w* be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, but on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* there shall be to you an holy \w day|strong="H6944"\w*, a \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: whosoever \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 35.2 \ft an…: Heb. holiness\f*
Ye shall \w kindle|strong="H1197"\w* no \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* throughout your \w habitations|strong="H4186"\w* upon the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* ye from among you an \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \w whosoever|strong="H3605"\w* \add is\add* of a \w willing|strong="H5081"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, let him \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* it, an \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*,
And \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add*,

And \w rams’|strong="H0352"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* dyed \w red|strong="H0119"\w*, and \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, and \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*,

And \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, and \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* for \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and for the \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*,

And \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* to be \w set|strong="H4394"\w* for the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and for the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*.

And every \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w hearted|strong="H3820"\w* among you shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*;

The \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and his \w covering|strong="H4372"\w*, his \w taches|strong="H7165"\w*, and his \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*, his \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*, his \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and his \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*,
The \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* thereof, \add with\add* the mercy \w seat|strong="H3727"\w*, and the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* of the \w covering|strong="H4539"\w*,
The \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, and his \w staves|strong="H0905"\w*, and all his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w shewbread|strong="H6440"\w*,

The \w candlestick|strong="H4501"\w* also for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, and his \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*, and his \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*, with the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*,

And the \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and his \w staves|strong="H0905"\w*, and the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and the \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the door at the entering \w in|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*,

The \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, with his \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w grate|strong="H4345"\w*, his \w staves|strong="H0905"\w*, and all his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* and his \w foot|strong="H3653"\w*,

The \w hangings|strong="H7050"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, his \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*, and the \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w door|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*,
The \w pins|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and the \w pins|strong="H3489"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, and their \w cords|strong="H4340"\w*,

The \w cloths|strong="H0899"\w* of \w service|strong="H8278"\w*, to do \w service|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, to minister in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.

¶ And all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* stirred him \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and every one whom his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* made \w willing|strong="H5068"\w*, \add and\add* they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* to the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and for all his \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, and for the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*.

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, as many \w as|strong="H3605"\w* were \w willing|strong="H5081"\w* \w hearted|strong="H3820"\w*, \add and\add* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w bracelets|strong="H2397"\w*, and \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w*, and \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, and \w tablets|strong="H3558"\w*, all \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: and every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w offered|strong="H5130"\w* \add offered\add* an \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And every \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, with whom was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add*, and \w red|strong="H0119"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* of \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w*, \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add*.

Every one that did \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* an \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*: and every man, with whom was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* for any \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add*.

And all the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* that were \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w hearted|strong="H3820"\w* did \w spin|strong="H2901"\w* with their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* that which they had \w spun|strong="H4299"\w*, \add both\add* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and of \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \add and\add* of \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and of fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

And all the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w stirred|strong="H5375"\w* them up in \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w spun|strong="H2901"\w* \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add*.

And the \w rulers|strong="H5387"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* to be \w set|strong="H4394"\w*, for the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and for the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*;

And \w spice|strong="H1314"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* for the \w light|strong="H3974"\w*, and for the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and for the \w sweet|strong="H5561"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w*.

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* a willing \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* made them \w willing|strong="H5068"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* for all manner of \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to be \w made|strong="H6213"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uri|strong="H0221"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*;

And he hath \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* him with the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, in \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*, and in \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and in all manner of \w workmanship|strong="H4399"\w*;

And to \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* curious \w works|strong="H4284"\w*, to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* in \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and in \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and in \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*,

And in the \w cutting|strong="H2799"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, to \w set|strong="H4390"\w* \add them\add*, and in \w carving|strong="H2799"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* any manner of \w cunning|strong="H4284"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

And he hath \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* that he may \w teach|strong="H3384"\w*, \add both\add* he, and \w Aholiab|strong="H0171"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahisamach|strong="H0294"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*.

Them hath he \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* all manner of \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, of the \w engraver|strong="H2796"\w*, and of the cunning \w workman|strong="H2803"\w*, and of the \w embroiderer|strong="H7551"\w*, in \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and in \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, in \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and in fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and of the \w weaver|strong="H0707"\w*, \add even\add* of them that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, and of those that \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* cunning \w work|strong="H4284"\w*.
